sdk.utils.uri_utils#

Common URI utils.

sdk.utils.uri_utils.parse_uri(uri: str) → ParseResult#

Parse an uri.

Parameters:
uristr

URI.

Returns:
ParseResult

ParseResult object.

sdk.utils.uri_utils.get_uri_scheme(uri: str) → str#

Get scheme of an URI.

Parameters:
uristr

URI.

Returns:
str

URI scheme.

sdk.utils.uri_utils.get_uri_netloc(uri: str) → str#

Return URI netloc/bucket.

Parameters:
uristr

URI.

Returns:
str

URI netloc.

sdk.utils.uri_utils.get_uri_path(uri: str) → str#

Return URI path.

Parameters:
uristr

URI.

Returns:
str

URI path.

sdk.utils.uri_utils.get_name_from_uri(uri: str) → str#

Return filename from uri.

Parameters:
uristr

URI.

Returns:
str

Filename.

sdk.utils.uri_utils.get_extension(uri: str) → str#

Return extension from uri.

Parameters:
uristr

URI.

Returns:
str

Extension.

sdk.utils.uri_utils.build_key(dst: str) → str#

Build key to upload objects.

Parameters:
dststr

Destination URI.

Returns:
str

Key.

sdk.utils.uri_utils.as_uri(path: str) → str#

Convert a path to an URI.

Parameters:
pathstr

Path.

Returns:
str

URI.

Notes

If path is a relative path, it will be returned as it is.
